message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I know you're interested in. Given its value, I'm offering it to you for $14,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. What do you say?

Bob, I understand your perspective, and I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  While $12,500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This offer reflects the true value of the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with $13,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $13,000. Can we meet at this price?
